section.title: Description
section.p: This class represents the amounts previously determined by other payers to be the responsibility of the Patient.

stentry.p: "The patient’s cost share from a previous payer." - NCPDP Telecommunication (Field 352-NQ, Data Dictionary 201104).

"Code qualifying the Other Payer-Patient Responsibility Amount." - NCPDP Telecommunication (Field 351-NP, Data Dictionary 201104). Possible values include: Amount Applied to Periodic Deductible; Amount Attributed to Product Selection/Brand Drug; Amount Attributed to Sales Tax; Amount Exceeding Periodic Benefit Maximum; Amount of Copay; Patient Pay Amount; Amount of Coinsurance; Amount Attributed to Product Selection/Non-Preferred Formulary Selection; Amount Attributed to Health Plan Assistance Amount; Amount Attributed to Provider Network Selection; Amount Attributed to Product Selection/Brand Non-Preferred Formulary Selection; Amount Attributed to Coverage Gap; Amount Attributed to Processor Fee; Not Specified.
